faqs.a: D2MBox is a modern cloud storage platform that helps you store, sync, and share personal and business data safely, securely, and conveniently. You can access your data anytime, anywhere, on any device with just one account. D2MBox is suitable for individuals, workgroups, and businesses who want to optimize digital data management.

We apply multiple layers of security: data encryption during transmission and storage, strict access control, multi-factor authentication (2FA), and regular security testing. Only you and those you authorize can access your data. D2MBox commits not to share personal data with third parties without your consent.

faqs.q: What devices can I access my data from?
faqs.a: You can access D2MBox from computers, phones, tablets through the website or app (if available). Data is synchronized instantly across all devices. For example: you upload a file from your phone, you can open it immediately on your laptop without additional operations.

faqs.q: How do I recover my password if I forget it?
faqs.a: You just need to click 'Forgot Password' on the login page, enter your registered email. The system will send a verification code to your email, you enter this code and set a new password. If you encounter difficulties, contact the support team for quick assistance.

faqs.q: Does D2MBox support sharing files with people outside the system?
faqs.a: Yes. You can create share links for files/folders to anyone, including people without D2MBox accounts. You can set passwords, expiration times, or only allow viewing without downloading to control access rights.

faqs.q: Can I upgrade or downgrade my service plan?
faqs.a: You can upgrade/downgrade your plan at any time in the account management section. Balance or duration will be automatically calculated according to D2MBox policy. If you need advice on suitable plans, contact the support team for detailed answers.
We use reputable payment gateways, encrypt transactions, and do not store your card information on the system. All transactions are confirmed via email or SMS to ensure absolute safety for users.

You can contact us via email contact-d2m@dammeviet.vn, hotline +84 911 930 807 or send support requests directly on the website. Our support team is always ready to answer all questions and handle incidents 24/7.

You can recover deleted files within the temporary storage period (Recycle Bin, usually 15-30 days). After this period, data will be permanently deleted from the system and cannot be recovered. Please check carefully before deleting important data.

faqs.q: Can I use D2MBox for business?
faqs.a: D2MBox provides specialized service packages and features for businesses: group management, detailed permissions, usage reports, API integration, private deployment support. Contact us to receive advice on the most suitable solution for your business.
